weka.distributed.spark

Class RandomizedDataSparkJob

  • java.lang.Object
    • distributed.core.DistributedJob
      • weka.distributed.spark.SparkJob
        • weka.distributed.spark.RandomizedDataSparkJob
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, CommandlineRunnable, EnvironmentHandler, OptionHandler

    public class RandomizedDataSparkJob
extends SparkJob
implements CommandlineRunnable
    Job for creating randomly shuffled (and stratified if a nominal class is set) RDDs. Can also persist the shuffled splits as either binary object files or CSV.
    Version:
    $Revision: 11601 $
    Author:
    Mark Hall (mhall{[at]}pentaho{[dot]}com)
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
